remarks: Version of ~ dvelim that doesn't use ~ ax-10 .  Because it has different distinct variable constraints than ~ dvelim and is used in important proofs, it would be better if it had a name which does not end in ALT (ideally more close to set.mm naming).  (Contributed by NM, 17-May-2008.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dvelimALT.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
dvelimALT.2 $e |- ( z = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
dvelimALT $p |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( ps -> A. x ps ) ) $.
$d ps z $.
$d x z $.
$d y z $.
